long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Barkr is a bookmarking app like no other.

Organise bookmarks into collections and then find your favourite websites quickly and easily, using an intuitive search rather than wading through masses of folders.

Barkr's intuitive interface, beautiful design and functionality make it a joy to use.

Customise bookmarks either with funky Barkr illustrations, or choose an image from the saved website in the Premium version.

Download the plugin, and start your journey with Barkr !
